caption.title: Significant predictors of student belief in global warming (n = 369).
caption.p: Student belief scale ranged from 1 (strong disbelief in GW) to 9 (strong belief in GW). Predicted values were derived from model 1 in Table 3. Low and high values of teacher belief in GW and student CC knowledge reflect the predictions for the 10 th and 90 th percentiles, respectively. Accordingly, larger differences between two values indicate larger effects sizes, with all other variables held constant. Error bars represent 95% confidence intervals.
